dmca.title: RE: [TacomaArt] the 'blog' is a subversive lie
dmca.body:
I am appalled that such a libelous email could be permitted through thislistserv. I do hope the originator is dealt with accordingly. I started
 Intra-Designs 4 years ago in Puyallup, WA. It is a local company that has put a lot back into the community, and it upsets me that people like this are allowed to abuse such a wonderful try to bring the art community
 together.

 It also surprises me that this insult is allowed to go through a city email listserv.

 I, for one, am publicly banning anything and everything by Mr. Richard Anderson and his company. I sincerely hope you do the same.

 Sincerely,
 Ty Belknap
 Intra-Designs, Inc.
 Daffodil Valley Times


 Live Like Nobody is Watching
